comments: He definitely has a personality and style that is not for everyone, and he can come across as difficult if you don\'t know your stuff, but if you want a professor who knows what hes talking about and encourages debate, Prof. Contarino is a good choice.

Absolute waste of time. It wasn\'t at all what was advertised! He plays favorites too. In the end, if you not "in" your grade will reflect it. Lectures were lacking and we paid for a 100.00 book used THREE TIMES!!! I would never take one of his classes again.
He may be liberal, but he\'ll listen to all sides as long as you use reason and logic.
